The correct chronological order is: (3) Rock music intro fades as the woman introduces their visit to Cedar Creek Park. (4) Close-up of a purple bicycle as she calls it her "trusty little steed" bought for $40. (5) A small black dog is tucked into a red backpack after encouragement to "go on in there." (1) Aerial cycling with auto-tuned male vocals singing "Cause I can fly." (2) She jokes her gears aren't shifting and says she'll put dinner on the grill.

Therefore, the answer is C: 3 -> 5 -> 4 -> 1 -> 2.

The correct chronological order is: (1) She describes the location as "the party park of Lake Whitney." (2) She remarks that this weekend has been lovely with no problems. (3) She says she'll try to gather firewood; then a modern rock song starts over scenic shots. (4) Fresh tortilla chips are lifted with a slotted spoon onto paper towels. (5) She talks about leash-training her cat Roo for camping and thanks viewers. (6) She summarizes bike riding and cooking as an end screen "Lost On Land Again" appears and she signs off. (7) The "Outtakes" title over a moon appears, introducing extra clips. Therefore, the answer is A: 1 -> 2 -> 3 -> 4 -> 5 -> 6 -> 7.
